clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Concurrent Chemo-radiotherapy Combined With Recombinant Human Endostatin for Local Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC)
clinical_study.official_title: The Exploratory Clinical Study of Concurrent Chemo-radiotherapy Combined With Recombinant Human Endostatin (Endostar) for Local Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC (Ⅲ A / Ⅲ B) )

collaborator.agency: Daping Hospital and the Research Institute of Surgery of the Third Military Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: It is a trials to evaluate the overall survival (OS) of radiotherapy / EP combined with recombinant human endostatin in treatment of locally advanced (Ⅲ A / unresectable Ⅲ B) non-small cell lung cancer.

arm_group.description: the dose of radiotherapy is 60-66 Gy / 30-33f.The combination regimen is etoposide (50 mg/m2 day1-5, 29-33) and cisplatin (50 mg/m2 day1, 8, 29, 36) in the 1st, 4th weeks of radiotherapy for 2 courses.
recombinant human endostatin: The number of courses is 3 ~ 4 and each course last for 28 days.dose:15mg，d1-14, intravenous injection.
